column2: an A.M. Eatery////One of my girlfriends suggested this place for a Saturday brunch
column3: and since it was already on my restaurant bucket list
column4: I agreed.  I had heard there was a long wait there
column5: and boy they weren't kidding.  We got there around 11
column6: and there was an hour and a half wait.  Geez.  Well alrighty then.
